blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The Best CMS For Markdown.
blocks.text: Plug-in TinaCMS into your markdown-based project, to provide an easy-to-use editor experience.

blocks.content:
## Empower your Markdown projects with TinaCMS

TinaCMS provides an intuitive content editing interface for your Markdown files. Benefit from configurable shortcodes and unlock an enhanced content creation experience.

items.headline: Tailored CMS for Markdown
items.text: TinaCMS can be configured to work seamlessly with your Markdown files.

items.headline: Configurable Shortcodes
items.text: Create and configure shortcodes for your preferred web framework to simplify the management of dynamic content.

items.headline: Dynamic Content
items.text: Create more dynamic and interactive content with the power of Markdown and the flexibility of TinaCMS.

items.headline: Enhanced Developer Experience
items.text: Reduce the complexity of handling Markdown files and improve your developer workflow with TinaCMS.

items.headline: Efficient Content Management
items.text: Manage your Markdown-based content more efficiently with TinaCMS's user-friendly interface.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend codebase is open-source, backed by a vibrant community and regular updates.

blocks.headline: Ready to transform your Markdown projects?

seo.title: The Best CMS For Markdown
seo.description: Elevate your Markdown projects with TinaCMS. Enjoy a customized CMS experience tailored for your Markdown content with configurable shortcodes.
